vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 2 to the professional services contract with CP&Y, Inc. to provide additional engineering services required for design, environmental services, and construction administration at two locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $131,701.18, from $775,301.25 to $907,002.43 - Financing: Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($85,100.00) and Street and Alley Improvement Fund ($46,601.18)
